LEAD: Susanne Romy Thelen Denk and Alan John Romney y de Cardenas were married yesterday at Brick Presbyterian Church in New York. The Rev. Dr. Herbert B. Anderson performed the ceremony, assisted by the Rev. Thomas C. Blessin, a Roman Catholic priest. Mrs. Romney is the daughter of Ruth E. Schreyer Denk of New York and the late Horst G.

Susanne Romy Thelen Denk and Alan John Romney y de Cardenas were married yesterday at Brick Presbyterian Church in New York. The Rev. Dr. Herbert B. Anderson performed the ceremony, assisted by the Rev. Thomas C. Blessin, a Roman Catholic priest. Mrs. Romney is the daughter of Ruth E. Schreyer Denk of New York and the late Horst G. Denk. The bridegroom is a son of Piedad M. de Cardenas of New York and Dr. Harry Romney of Majorca, Spain.

The bride, a graduate of Wells College, is an administrative assistant to the New York regional administrator of the General Services Administration. Her father headed the Denk Baking Corporation in New York.

The bridegroom is a first vice president in the institutional futures division at Shearson Lehman Brothers in New York. He received a master's degree in piano from the Juilliard School of Music and an M.B.A. from New York University. His father is a retired orthopedic surgeon.
